amendment.description: To establish a program for the management of post-project completion retirement benefits for employees at Department of Energy project completion sites.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1383 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

Amendment SA 1383 proposed by Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S8786-8788; text: CR S8785-8786) To establish a program for the management of post-project completion retirement benefits for employees at Department of Energy project completion sites.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1383 proposed by Senator Allard.
